name: PitFall! Recreation
description: PitFall! Recreation is a timed tension platformer that, derives inspiration from Jeff koons an iconic pop culture artist that also incorporates the Atari title Pitfall! The player is an assistant that is trying to find Jeff Koons art piece "Michael Jackson and Bubbles" unfortunately they have been seperated and  have to find them individually. Jeff has decided to turn his Exhibition pieces into mechatronics that guard his apartment complex. The player soon realises they have fallen into a bad situation and are running out of time. Players will now race against the clock trying find "Michael Jackson and Bubbles".
